author: PlayStation
description:
Cairn's demo is out now! Play it on PlayStation 5 right now:  https://bit.ly/Cairn-PS5Demo
Wishlist Cairn: https://bit.ly/Cairn-PS5Store

In Free Solo mode you’ll experience the high tension of climbing without a rope. Any fall can be fatal. Die, and you start over. Can you make it through the push to the summit? 

Cairn features realistic simulation that allows you to climb intuitively, anywhere. Find the best holds and place your hands and feet seamlessly with simple controls. Adapt your posture, effort and balance - if you're not careful, you will fall!

Music: Only the Mountain from Cairn OST: 
Composed, performed, produced, mixed and mastered by The Toxic Avenger.
℗ 2025 Enchanté Records - under licence to The Game Bakers & G4F Records
© 2025 The Game Bakers - G4F Records
Publishing Enchanté Records.
Distributed by G4F Records
title: Cairn - Free Solo Mode Reveal | PS5 Games

Step into the shoes of a King Rajendra Chola, torn between duty and destiny. Son of Thanjai is a cinematic, single-player action-adventure game set in a stunningly reimagined medieval South India. Along with intense combat and exploration, Son of Thanjai invites you into the cultural heartbeat of the Chola world, one that's rife with deeply immersive experiences. Wishlist now on PS5.

author: PlayStation
description:
Welcome to Albion, Governor! 
Discover these mysterious Celtic wetlands, where no civilized Roman wants to be. From architectural styles to which deities to worship, the degree to which you Romanize your provinces is up to you. Will you embrace local Celtic culture or impose Roman traditions? The fate of this region—and your legacy—is yours to decide.

Anno 117: Pax Romana is available November 13, 2025

#ps5games #ps5 #gamescom #anno117 #anno117paxromana
title: Anno 117: Pax Romana - Albion Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
From the mech cockpit to crops - fight, farm, and forge a new life

reap what Bounty Star sows October 23, 2025

PlayStation 5: https://store.playstation.com/concept/10011319 

Bounty Star is an over-the-shoulder 3D action game that marries mech combat and customization with farming and base building. The player takes on the role of a broken but powerful ex-soldier named Clem, a war veteran, talented fighter and expert mech pilot. Clem attempts to shed the guilt and shame of her past and become a legitimate force for good in the Red Expanse, a post-post-apocalyptic version of the American Southwest.

Developed by DINOGOD. Published by Annapurna Interactive.

© Annapurna Interactive, 2025
title: Bounty Star - Release Date Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10013900

Steel your nerves and sharpen your blades; Styx is back with a first look at pure, unfiltered gameplay of his new adventure Styx: Blades of Greed!

Step into the grimy boots of Styx, the world's sneakiest goblin (self-proclaimed, but who's arguing?) and lead your crew into the shadows of a crumbling empire.

Outsmart, outstab, and outsteal your enemies.
Explore 3 towering environments built for vertical stealth.
Chase Quartz, because power, war, and shiny things are always worth the risk.

This is more than a comeback, it's a masterclass in stealth, greed, and goblin charm.
Because one goblin with a dagger can ruin anyone's day.

Styx: Blades of Greed launches Fall 2025 on PlayStation®5.

#ps5games #ps5 #gamescom  #styxbladesofgreed

May contain content inappropriate for children. Visit http://www.esrb.org for rating information.
title: Styx: Blades of Greed - Gameplay Reveal Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10008744

Coming to PlayStation 5 on October 23rd 2025!

In the wake of her sister Anna’s traumatic abduction at the hands of Mother Lucia and her twisted cult, Caroline Walker finds herself trapped deep within the walls of a maze-like convent. With the darkness closing in, Caroline is unexpectedly reacquainted with her old friend, the pneumatic nailer, and so begins a desperate struggle to escape the unholy place.

But once free of the convent, the true horror of the secluded Villa Hess reveals itself and Caroline must again call upon her supernatural abilities to travel to the town’s mysterious ‘Other side’ and face the formidable creatures that await within…

Rated Mature

#ps5 #ps5games #gamescom
title: Tormented Souls 2 - "A New Nightmare" Gameplay Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Take on a redesigned Be A Pro mode in EA SPORTS™ NHL® 26! Pre-order to play 7 Days Early now
The revamped Be A Pro allows you to live your hockey journey from rookie to superstar with fresh storylines, characters, challenges, and cutscenes. Experience a superb cast of voice actors that make BAP more authentic and engaging than ever before, as each choice you make impacts your career. Play your way from World Juniors to the draft, experience the emotions of your first pro game, the highs of being a human highlight reel to getting grilled at post-game pressers for a lingering dry spell — and if that keeps up, having to work your way back to the big league from the minors. In BAP, craft your personality and playstyle on the big stage. From the abilities and X Factors you use to being a brash superstar or humble locker room hero, your Create-A-Player is as unique and dynamic as you are. Plus, genuine tunnel walkouts for a selection of NHL teams and all-new facial animations bring an extra
title: EA Sports NHL 26 - Be A Pro Deep Dive | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
I Hate This Place is a craft-focused, isometric survival horror game filled with twisted monsters and warped realities, all wrapped in a bold comic book art style and dripping with an ’80s horror vibe.

Coming to PS5 on November 7th, 2025.

Explore a harsh and unforgiving wilderness and scavenge for resources. Craft weapons and supplies to fortify your shelter by day and prepare for nightfall, as that is when all hell tends to break loose.

Inspired by the Eisner award-nominated comic book series created by Kyle Starks and Artyom Topilin, I Hate This Place: The Game plunges players deep into a supernatural world where the rules of reality come undone.

Players take on the role of Elena, whose fight for survival begins when she unwittingly awakens a malevolent force. Outmatched and hunted in a hostile world, players must think fast, manipulating their surroundings to even the odds against formidable foes, engaging in tense gunfights and melee combat that rewards ingenuity over brute fo
title: I Hate This Place - Release Date Trailer | PS5 Games
